amendment.description: An amendment numbered 217 printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 to express a Sense of Congress that diplomacy is essential for addressing North Korea's nuclear program as a military confrontation would pose extreme risks, and the US should pursue a sustained and credible diplomatic process to achieve the denuclearization of North Korea and an end to the 69-year-long Korean War. (10 minutes).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Khanna amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Khanna amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Khanna.
